ComicInfo.Summary:
Schismatic takes place in Arka Dune, a world with two moons that cause thousand-foot tides. A violent, deep sea-worshipping cult has risen to power and is threatening war.
Our story follows Idris and Amalia, a pair of pacifists trying to give their children a sweet and simple life. When a disastrous encounter with the cult tears apart their family, they embark on a quest for revenge that takes them on an epic adventure across their perilous planet and deep into enemy territory…
Over the course of the story, they’ll encounter dungeons, monsters, deep sea creatures, flash floods full of lava, a civilization of bohemian/drug-addled otterfolk, a tribe of Amazon-like warriors, and much, much more. Donate now if you’d like to read!
